Title: Requires certain health insurance policies to provide coverage for diabetes screening for people of Asian American or Pacific Islander descent if they have a body mass index of 23 or greater
Summary: Requires certain health insurance policies to provide coverage for diabetes screening for people of Asian American or Pacific Islander descent if they have a body mass index of 23 or greater.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring certain health insurance policies to provide coverage for diabetes screening for people of Asian American or Pacific Island descent if they have a body mass index of 23 or greater
